Key Match Events: Jakub Kiwior's foul on Ousmane Dembélé gave him a penalty which Mbappé converted
Robert Lewandowski scored a penalty to equalize for Poland
Łukasz Skorupski made six excellent saves for Poland
Post-Match Reflections: Łukasz Skorupski praised his performance and readiness to be the number one goalkeeper
Didier Deschamps acknowledged the goalkeeper's performance and expressed no disappointment
Michał Probierz thanked the fans and players for their commitment
Miscellaneous Highlights: France have not won their final group match in any of their last nine major tournaments
Lewandowski is the third player to score in four successive EUROs
France are through to the knockout phase for the seventh time in the last eight EUROs
